dateText: 2024年10月14日に日本でレビュー済み
title:
5つ星のうち5.0
 Beauty of Joseon Revive Eye Serum with Ginseng + Retinal
body: The Beauty of Joseon Revive Eye Serum with Ginseng + Retinal has become an essential part of my routine. It feels so lightweight yet deeply nourishing. Whenever I use it, my under-eye area looks more refreshed, and over time, I’ve noticed a visible reduction in fine lines. The ginseng gives my skin that extra boost of hydration and vitality, while the retinal helps with anti-aging. I apply it both morning and night, and it layers perfectly with the rest of my skincare. It’s a must-have for anyone looking to brighten and smooth the eye area!

dateText: 2025年9月30日にインドでレビュー済み
title: Smooth Absorption and Noticeable Firmness
body: Lightweight yet nourishing! ✨ The Beauty of Joseon Revive Eye Serum absorbs well without feeling heavy and leaves the skin around my eyes smoother and more elastic. The ginseng and retinal combo really helps with fine lines, and the texture is silky, not sticky. Great ingredients and gentle enough for daily use!

dateText: 2025年9月21日にオーストラリアでレビュー済み
title: Gentle and Hydrating Eye Cream
body: After consistent use, I noticed that my under-eye area looks more hydrated, less puffy, slightly brighter. It’s gentle enough for my sensitive skin and works well under makeup or concealer

dateText: 2025年4月29日にシンガポールでレビュー済み
title: Game-Changer for Tired Eyes – Gentle Yet Effective!
body:
I’ve been using the Beauty of Joseon Ginseng & Retinal Eye Serum for a few weeks now, and I am honestly so impressed with the results. My under-eye area tends to look tired and puffy, especially in the mornings, but this serum has made a noticeable difference in brightness, firmness, and smoothness.

The texture is silky and lightweight, and it absorbs beautifully without feeling greasy or heavy. I love that it combines ginseng, known for its revitalizing and nourishing properties, with retinal, a gentler form of retinoid that’s great for sensitive skin. It delivers all the anti-aging benefits without irritation, dryness, or peeling.

After regular use, I’ve noticed a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and a more even tone around my eyes. My concealer also applies more smoothly, which is a bonus I didn’t expect! A little goes a long way, so this 30ml bottle will definitely last.
